TopicTitle: new gamemode and muiltplayer for kerbal space program

Articles.Content: hello newbes and longtime players of kerbal space program i am cnnr20, a player of ksp.  this topic is about ideas for new gamemodes and muiltplayer for future updates of ksp, this topic is for squad to add a new game mode and a muiltplayer mode for ksp. rules:  no excrements talking, trolling, and swearing, fallow rules for site, have fun!

Multiplayer is a planned feature, though the plan has changed a few times and I do not know when we might see it implemented. 

Meanwhile, welcome to the forum.

Hello cnnr20 and welcome!

As Vanamonde indicated above, multi-player has been mentioned in plans for the future.  I have no idea if this is still in the works, though.  Time will tell.

Happy landings!

Without going into the details, multiplayer for KSP would be very complicated. There have been a few mods (DMP) That I tried, but I tried to do a community space station and some jerk shot at it with a battleship...

But mostly it is the persistence and time warp issues. Though a stable multiplayer would be awesome.

Hello cnnr20 and welcome!

Your profile pic made me chuckle. It's like star... hawk..... yep, that'll do it. Haha

...I tried to do a community space station and some jerk shot at it with a battleship...
